data.subject: Emotion
data.lyric:
Koboreochiru hodo no imagination 
 kimi to boku to ni nin dake no sutori 
 afuredashi ta hajimete

data.subject: 好きだからしょうがない / Sukidakara Shouganai (좋아하니까 어쩔 수 없어)
data.lyric:
I love you baby 
 sasayai te mo 
 kimi wa shiranpuri 
 dakedo baby 
 nakihajime tara 
 sugu ni boku

data.subject: Choo Choo Train
data.lyric:
Fun Fun We hit the step step
 onaji kaze no naka We know
 We love Oh
 Heat Heat beat's
 like a skip

data.subject: Blue Moon
data.lyric:
Unbelievable believable demo 
 I'm biribiri believer mada 
 hitori kiri 
 sagashiteru baka na yume

data.subject: You And I
data.lyric:
Donna sora no shita ni i te mo
 donna machi de kurashi te i te mo
 bokura wa tsunagatteru
 ima nara

data.subject: 以心電信 / Ishin Denshin (이심전신)
data.lyric:
Hanareteru ki ga shi nai ne
 kimi to boku to no kyori
 me o tsubutte i te mo kimi no
 koe de wakaru

data.subject: そうすれば / Sousureba (그러면)
data.lyric:
Tsukare hate te tachidomatte mo
 sonna kao o shi nai de
 yume oikake te miushinatte mo
 sono tomoshi

data.subject: Follow Me
data.lyric:
I've got a dream baby 
 you're wonderful
 I'll be there I'll be there Yeah
 mo mayowa nai kimi to na
